full_name: Kevin Pentecost, CISSP CISM CEH CPT
occupation: Information Security Director at Standard Motor Products
headline: Information Security Director @ Standard Motor Products | Cybersecurity Expert | Co-Host of The Cyber Distortion Podcast
summary:
As the Information Security Director at Standard Motor Products, I have over 25 years of experience in protecting and enhancing the security of information systems and networks across the global organization. I am responsible for implementing, designing, managing, and allocating all the technology security measures, as well as ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.

I am passionate about sharing my knowledge and expertise in cybersecurity with various audiences and platforms. I am a co-host of the Cyber Distortion Podcast, where we cover all of today's relevant topics related to anything and everything around cybersecurity. I am also an active member and leader of several professional and industry associations, such as MEMA, ISACA, Infragard, and Autocare. I hold multiple certifications, including CISSP, CPT, CEH, CISM, MCSE+I, and CCA. My mission is to empower and educate others on how to safeguard their data and systems from cyber threats and attacks.
